verses.name: Leviticus 4:9
verses.text: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away,

verses.name: Leviticus 4:10
verses.text: As it was taken off from the bullock of the sacrifice of peace offerings: and the priest shall burn them upon the altar of the burnt offering.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:11
verses.text: And the skin of the bullock, and all his flesh, with his head, and with his legs, and his inwards, and his dung,
